definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks

sentences.english: Don't speak in such abstract terms.
sentences.chinese: 不要这样抽象地谈问题。

sentences.english: Well read it, and we'll talk about it some other time, eh.
sentences.chinese: 那好，拿去看吧。我们另找时间谈，嗯？

sentences.english: I must have my share in the conversation, if you are speaking of music.
sentences.chinese: 要是你们谈音乐，就得有我的份儿。

sentences.english: Talk with children about human bodies and how they work.
sentences.chinese: 和小孩谈人类的身体，以及它们怎样工作。

sentences.english: The third chapter is mainly about the establishment of urban landscapes, artistic language.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，主要是谈都市山水画艺术语言的建立。

sentences.english: He must be permitted to speak of that Paris as though it still existed.
sentences.chinese: 请允许他谈那旧时的巴黎，好象它现在仍然存在一样。

sentences.english: We've only been dating two days; it's nowhere near a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我们才谈了两个月的恋爱，还谈不上结婚的事。

sentences.english: And while we’re talking about chores, the light in the basement burned out.
sentences.chinese: 既然在谈家务事，地下室的灯泡烧坏了。

sentences.english: He warned us about the serious situation of Byland Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他向我们谈了朝鲜半岛的严重形势。

sentences.english: Then Tom turned coolly away, still talking, and took Amy with him.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆冷冰冰地转身带着艾美走了，边走边和她谈着。

sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪汉问题，我想谈几点粗略的看法。

sentences.english: This man talked with Manuel, and money chinked between them.
sentences.chinese: 这人跟曼纽尔谈了谈，钱在他俩之间叮当响。

sentences.english: This man talked with Manuel, and money chinked between them.
sentences.chinese: 这人跟曼纽尔谈了谈，钱在他俩之间叮当响。

sentences.english: Want to talk about the manufacturing industry of Zi rich, can talk about 3 night on 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 要谈淄博的制造业，可以谈上三天三夜。

sentences.english: Any question can be discussed under the One-China Principle .
sentences.chinese: 在一个中国原则下，什么问题都可以谈。

sentences.english: We get absorbed in discussion for several hours every time we meet.
sentences.chinese: 我们每次见面都会入彀地谈上几个小时。

definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
to associate (with)/to have contact (with)/to hang out (with)/to date/(interpersonal) relationship/association/contact
